text:
July 18, 1955
Mr. M. S. Novik
MSB Management Consultant
300 West 23rd Street
Hoorn 500
New York 11, N. Y.
Dear Morrie:
Your sentiments on Jilbur are rry own. Mighty glad to see
them.
Here*s one guy :/ho*ll write him, when atvice is needed, no
matter where he goes. The NAEB indeed owes him more than we can
ever repay.
Sincerely,
Harry J* Skornia
Executive Director
HJSjcr
Blind copy to Schramm,
